prompt.content: Calculate Danaos Corporation (NYSE:DAC) EV/EBITDA for fiscal year 2024 using their 2024 20F filing. Use $1.52B as Danaos's market cap on December 31st, 2024. Ignore lease liabilities and round to the nearest three decimals.

messages.content: [{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Report FY2024 EBITDA as $697.550 million"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Report Cash and cash equivalents as $453.384 million"},{"criteria":"Report total debt outstanding as $744.546 million","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Report marketable securities as $60.850 million","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Report market capitalization as $1,520 million","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Calculate EV 1520 + 744.546 - 453.384 - 60.850 = $1750.312 million"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Calculate EV/EBITDA as 1750.312 / 697.550 = 2.509965"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Round to 3 decimals = 2.510x"}]
